results.title: The Inquiry
results.creator_credit: Damiano Damiani, Clesi Cinematografica and Italian International Film
results.brief_description: The Roman Emperor Tiberius, living in paranoid isolation on the island of Capri, instructs is lieutenant Taurus to go to Palestine and find the missing body of Jesus of Nazareth who was crucified three years earlier. The word is out that Jesus has risen from the dead and Tiberius is both adamant to dispel potentially dangerous rumours and discover the truth for himself. The arrival of the Emperor’s inquistor throws the local authorities into alarm since it appears that everyone in the township has a reason to fear abd something to hide, especially the local governor Pontius Pilate. What is the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of the corpse of Jesus? Starring Keith Carradine and Harvey Keitel.

results.title: The Innocents [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Jack Clayton, Jack Clayton Productions, Achilles Productions and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: A dark but brilliantly realised adaptation of Henry James’ gothic horror tale ‘Turn of the Screw’. A 19th century British governess (Deborah Kerr) arrives at a bleak mansion to take care of the wealthy household’s two children. Gradually, she begins to believe that there is a malevolent force in the children despite their beatific appearance. While Henry James’ novel leaves little doubt that they have been possessed by the demonic souls of the previous governess and her valet lover, who had died on the estate after an illicit sadomasochistic relationship, the film entertains the possibility that the supernatural events experienced by the governess are merely the product of her vivid imagination. Clayton cleverly uses startling imagery and nerve-bending sound to terrify the audience. Through its use of decor and lighting, and the impressive performances of Kerr and Michael Redgrave as the uncle, the film effectively conveys a claustrophobic sense of repressed hysteria. Cast also includes Megs Jenkins, Pamela Franklin, Martin Stephens and Peter Wyngarde. Also on VHS NTSC [315944].

results.title: The Innocent = The Intruder = L'Innocente
results.creator_credit: Luchino Visconti, Giovanni Bertolucci, Francoriz, Societe Imp, Jacques Lettienne and Rizzoli Film
results.brief_description: This lavishly mounted tragedy is Luchino Visconti’s final film and it is among his greatest. Tullio and his wife Giuliana appear to have an open marriage - Giuliana is aware of her husband’s liaison with a young countess named Teresa but is prepared to do nothing about it. It is not until she herself falls passionately in love with another man, Filippo D’Arborio, and bears his child that the marriage begins to fall apart. Tullio, driven by jealousy takes irrevocable steps to sever his wife’s connection with her lover. Stars Giancarlo Giannini, Laura Antonelli and Jennifer O’Neill. Based on the novel by Gabriele D’Annunzio.

results.title: The Inner man steps out
results.creator_credit: Robert Wilmot, Henry Strauss and Pathescope Company of America
results.brief_description: A supervisor who knows the “book rules” for human relations finds himself in trouble when trying to apply them to people on the job. Points out the things a man with supervisory responsibility needs to know about the way different people react to different situations, and the use he can make of this knowledge to improve his own job function and that of the people he supervises.

results.title: The Inn of the sixth happiness
results.creator_credit: Mark Robson, Buddy Adler and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Based on the novel “The Small woman” by Alan Burgess this is the true story of Gladys Aylward, an English woman who went to China as a missionary in the 1900s. The film captures her involvement in the lives of the people of Yengcheng during the violent and turbulent times leading up to the Japanese invasion. Cast includes Ingrid Bergman, Curt Jurgens, Robert Donat, Richard Wattis. Nominated for an Academy Award, Best Director.

results.title: The Initial interview
results.brief_description: A marriage counselling session is presented, showing the initial interview. Afterwards a class of marriage counsellors are taught by flashbacks highlighting important moments of the interview. Role playing is introduced to mitigate the problems and fears of counsellors; interaction promotes emotional involvement of student counsellors.
